prioritize.translation[0].definitions[0]: to put several things, problems etc in order of importance, so that you can deal with the most important ones first
You need to prioritize your tasks.
prioritize.translation[0].definitions[1]: to deal with one thing first, because it is the most important
The public wants to see the fight against crime prioritized.
prioritize.translation[1].definitions[0]: to put several tasks, problems etc in order of importance so that the most important ones are done first
We are going to have to prioritize because of the very severe cutbacks in staff.
Those cars were critical to Nissanâ€™s image, so they prioritized them in the product cycle.
